means: 申斯通（姓氏； William, 1714-1763，英国诗人）

PerfectNetExp.abs: shensanqi 参三七, shenstone 申斯通, shenstone 威廉

auth_sentence.content: Built from stone and rubble in 1797, the dam stops thousands of homes in Shenstone and Tamworth being flooded.

auth_sentence.content: Mr Davies worked as a chef at the Toby carvery in Shenstone, Shropshire, and was due to retrain in graphic design.
